content:
Thank you!
Maybe related: we are since Aug 28 getting "Unable to find code LA6566-9" on LOINC AnswerIDs...
https://tx.fhir.org/loinc/en-US?type=loinc&code=LA6566-9

Can you please check/advise?
(it breaks our build :( )

(update: see also https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179202-terminology/topic/LOINC.20answer.20codes.3A.20error )
something went wrong with the 2.71 import. I've downgraded to 2.70 while I investigate

The release notes said there were no structural changes for 2.71, and the import completed successfully. But it sounds like something went awry with the LOINC answer codes. Let me know what you discover.
I've restored 2.71 now that I've processed it again
that URL above won't work - the web interface doesn't know about LA codes. But the terminology server does now

Ok, thanks. That makes sense. Just user error, then. :( I thought I had double checked. It would be nice, though, if we could point to the root folder of the LOINC distribution and have the loader find all of the files.
Thank you very much for the swift response - working again for us.
